description:
Light of Life is a challenging precision platformer about an elf named Elanor who possesses an incredible power!

The magical Life Fragments have been stolen by malicious goblins, and itâ€™s up to Elanor to use her trusty bow and arrow to recover them.

Featuring over 100 handmade levels full of cute, colorful pixel art, Light of Life offers a fun challenge for everyone. 
	
		
Features:
* 2D precision platform gameplay
* Use a bow with magical powers
* 100 challenging levels
* Collect crystals to unlock fantastic outfits for Elanor!
* 5 different worlds with different mechanics
name: Light of Life
